quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty… otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

quote: Health is not valued until sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Those who think they have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
author: Edward Stanley

quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don’t recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.
author: Unknown

quote: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the temple of your soul.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote: Wellness is the complete integration of body, mind, and spirit.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: A sad soul can kill you quicker than a germ.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Health and cheerfulness naturally beget each other.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: The power of love to change bodies is legendary, built into folklore, common sense, and everyday experience.
author: Larry Dossey

quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you’ve got a kingdom.
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don’t wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

quote: Eat to live, not live to eat.
author: Socrates
